workflows.name: Publish docs in the Wiki
workflows.display_title: ci: upgrade Taskgraph and dependencies + fix `test-taskgraph-definiti…

head_commit.message:
ci: upgrade Taskgraph and dependencies + fix `test-taskgraph-definitions` (#7042)

* ci: upgrade Taskgraph and dependencies

* ci: [test-taskgraph-definitions] stop running generations in parallel

There's a bug in Taskgraph that gets triggered when running the
generations in parallel on these workers for some reason. Generating the
params one at a time makes it go away.
